# ci.yml
# This file contains CI job definitions (templates)

.build-job:
  stage: build
  script:
    - echo "Starting build..."
    - echo "Building the application..."
    - echo "Build complete."
  artifacts:
    paths:
      - build/ # Path to the built application, to be passed to the CD stage
    expire_in: 1 week

.test-job:
  stage: test
  script:
    - echo "Starting tests..."
    - echo "Running unit tests and integration tests."
    - echo "Tests passed."
